admin db tools â€“ semantic class styles
   these classes style admin database tool buttons using semantic selectors,
   replacing legacy attribute-based css like button[onclick="..."] and avoiding
   styling via [data-action]. keep data-action strictly for behavior.
keep header/footer fixed
